name: pnp-powerplatform-snippets-minesweeper
title: Star Rating Gallery
shortDescription: A star rating control that allows users to select a value from 1 to 5 using visual stars. The stars fill based on the selected value.
longDescription: A visual star rating control that allows users to choose a rating from 1 to 5 by tapping on stars. The control displays filled stars up to the selected value and outlined stars for the rest, providing clear visual feedback. Itâ€™s ideal for capturing user feedback or preferences within apps.
